title: General Time Transformer: an Encoder-only Foundation Model for Zero-Shot Multivariate Time Series Forecasting
details: C Feng, L Huang, D Krompass - 2024
abstract: Abstract We present General Time Transformer (GTT), an encoder-only style foundation model for zero-shot multivariate time series forecasting. GTT is pretrained on a large dataset of 200M high-quality time series samples spanning diverse …
